thread.title: Raymond Lombardi
thread.title_full: Frames Direct reviewed by Raymond Lombardi

author: Raymond Lombardi
title: Raymond Lombardi
text: I started purchasing sunglasses from Frames Direct so when it came time for a new pair of eyeglasses I said, why not? Frame selection, check. Great pricing, check. Excellent communication and customer service, check. So, why go anywhere else? Past, present, and future customer! Very pleased!!
